name: Flippy Slime Friends
description:
How to play

Activate all of the tiles in a level to finish the level. Try to finish the least amount of moves you can.


You can use the on screen buttons or

Keyboard Controls

- Arrow keys : move
- S : switch (on levels with more than one slime)
- D : drop (if you're in a bubble)
- Enter : next
- Escape : back
- R : restart

Tile Mechanics

Arrow - Moves the player in the direction the arrow is facing.
Super Jump - Makes the player jump forward 2 tiles.
Ice - Makes the player continue moving in the same direction.
Block - Invalid tile. (Mostly used to stop ice)
Moving Tile - Has a set path and set interval.
Bubble - Allows free movement. Must land on a valid tile.
Teleport - 2 way portal. In one side, out the other, and vice-versa.
Finish Tile - All tiles must be activated and all Finish Tiles must be occupied by a slime.

Customization

You can customize your slime. Change your skin, face, and add accessories to give yourself a unique look. Unlock more customization options by getting diamonds. You can get diamonds by finishing levels with the same or lower amount of moves specified by the goal.

Leaderboards

Try the challenge levels. These are extremely difficult puzzles. If you manage to finish the challenge with a good enough score, you'll be on the leaderboards. You can show off your unique slime to others.
